Completely redesigned and rewritten new version. Using the latest abilities of iOS, we polished Quick Notes to the best. You can also enjoy new Apple Watch app, Spotlight search and more.

Unlock all features with one In-App purchase:
- History of your notes
- Night theme that automatically changes according to the brightness intensity
- Use dictation on your Apple Watch

We will add more features in the future. Stay tuned!

Time for quick update:
• The interface now takes full advantage of the newest screen sizes
• When you switch between apps, the insertion point will stay at the same place
• While the keyboard is active, you can shake your iPhone or iPad to Undo
• There is a new option to choose a dark or light mode of the widget for those who enjoy Everything in-app

Many thanks to all of you who helped to point these out!

Quick Notes now reflects your preferred reading text size, which can be set globally under the system Settings - Display & Brightness - Text Size. Thank you for pointing this out in reviews.
